definition.procedurexml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="X" type="Number">X</variable><variable id="Y" type="Number">Y</variable></variables><block type="text" x="686" y="34"><field name="TEXT">This Is for generating the east / west going walls</field></block><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="690" y="93"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="place_schematic"><field name="rotation">NONE</field><field name="mirror">NONE</field><field name="schematic">cornerwall1</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Starts at the provoided x location
Eg, starting at 0 will make a wall to 999</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:X</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:X</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">61</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Starts at the provoided x location
Eg, starting at 0 will make a wall to 999</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MOD</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:X</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">6</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="place_schematic"><field name="rotation">NONE</field><field name="mirror">NONE</field><field name="schematic">ewsupportstructure1</field><value name="x"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:X</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="coord_x"/></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Starts at the provoided x location
Eg, starting at 0 will make a wall to 999</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="place_schematic"><field name="rotation">NONE</field><field name="mirror">NONE</field><field name="schematic">ewflatwall1</field><value name="x"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:X</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="coord_x"/></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Starts at the provoided x location
Eg, starting at 0 will make a wall to 999</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></statement><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:X</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:X</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="text" x="765" y="164"><field name="TEXT">This loop creates the corner wall piece</field></block><block type="text" x="1191" y="353"><field name="TEXT">This loop creates the rest of the wall</field></block><block type="text" x="1475" y="426"><field name="TEXT">Every 6 chunks place a wall support</field></block><block type="text" x="896" y="490"><field name="TEXT">takes away a chunk from calculations because of corner piece</field></block><block type="text" x="1476" y="633"><field name="TEXT">everything else is hollow wall</field></block><block type="variables_set_number" x="775" y="1137"><field name="VAR">local:X</field><comment h="80" pinned="true" w="160">Starts at the provoided x location
Eg, starting at 0 will make a wall to 999</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1000</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Starts at the provoided x location
Eg, starting at 0 will make a wall to 999</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">256</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="block_add"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.STONE#0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:X</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="coord_x"/></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Starts at the provoided x location
Eg, starting at 0 will make a wall to 999</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:Y</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:X</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:X</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
